      • Task

        public Task()

      • Task

        public Task(int id,
            java.lang.String title,
            long completeBy,
            double value,
            java.lang.String currencyType)
        Creates a Task with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Task in the database
        title - The description of the task to be completed
        completeBy - The date (milliseconds since UNIX epoch) that this task is supposed to be completed by.
        value - The amount of money the user has bet against themselves to complete the task.
